All children, including those with disab: All children, including those with disabilities, need love, respect, nurturing, and time, especially during difficult and uncertain times.
There are many different types of play t: There are many different types of play that can be both fun and Educational
Language,numbers,objects,drama,and music: Language,numbers,objects,drama,and music games give children opportunities to explore and express themselves in a safe and fun way
Tell your children a story from your own: Tell your children a story from your own childhood
Ask your children to tell you a story: Ask your children to tell you a story
Make up a new story together starting wi: Make up a new story together starting with "once upon a time...". Each person adds a new sentence to the story.
Everyday household items like brooms,mop: Everyday household items like brooms,mops,or scarfs can become fun props for games
Place an object in the center of the roo: Place an object in the center of the room and whenever someone has an idea,they jump in and show the rest what the object can be.
For example,a broom might become a horse: For example,a broom might become a horse,microphone,or even a guitar!
Create a dance choreography to your chil: Create a dance choreography to your children,s favorite songs.First person does a dance and everyone else copies.Everyone takes turns being the leader.
\"Challenge\" who can do most toe touche: "Challenge" who can do most toe touches,jumping jacks,or laps around the room in a minute.
\"Mirror\" each other,s facial expressio: "Mirror" each other,s facial expressions,movements,sounds.one person can start as a leader and then switch.Try it with no leaders.
Freeze dance: Play music or someone sing: Freeze dance: Play music or someone sings a song and everyone dances.When the music stops,everyone must freeze.Last person still dancing becomes the judge for the next round.
Animal dance: Same as above but when the: Animal dance: Same as above but when the music stops,call out a name of an animal,and everyone has to become that animal.
First person says,\"when COVID-19 ends,: First person says,"when COVID-19 ends, I am going to....(e.g,go to the park)".
Second person adds to to the first perso: Second person adds to to the first person,"when COVID-19 ends,I am going to the park and...(e.g,visit my best friend)".
You can change this to any scenario in t: You can change this to any scenario in the future(e.g...,when i see my friend).
Singing songs to your baby or a young ch: Singing songs to your baby or a young child helps develop language.
Play or sing a song,and the first one to: Play or sing a song,and the first one to guess it right becomes the next eader.
Make up a song about handwashing or phys: Make up a song about handwashing or physical distancing.Add dance movements!
